mapper.insert: insert into member_study_info (id, member_study_id, title, type) values (#{id}, #{member_study_id}, #{title}, #{type})
mapper.select: select * from member_study_info where id = #{id} and member_study_id=#{value}
select * from member_study_info where id = #{id} and member_study_id like '${value}%'
